ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 3 |  | ldualvaddcl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) |

| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` W ) = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) = ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 7, 8, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ldualvadd | |- ( ph -> ( G .+ H ) = ( G oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) H ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 1, 4, 5, 6 | #P_lfladdcl | |- ( ph -> ( G oF ( +g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) H ) e. F ) |
